DOC.brief_title: uPAR PET/CT Preoperative Staging Breast Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The sensitivity specificity uPAR PET/CT detection lymph node metastasis test observer-blinded reading ( two separate team ) compare diagnostic performance conventional preoperative diagnostic workup procedure . The reference test histopathology lymph node obtain operative lymph node dissection ( SN/ALND ) . Primary end point dichotomize : +/- lymph node metastases ipsilateral axilla .
DOC.criteria: Biopsyverified breast cancer Primary tumor 2 cm ( ultrasound clinically ) The participant must capable understand give full inform write consent Pregnancy Lactation/breast feed Weight 140 kg Treatment neoadjuvant chemotherapy Known allergy towards IMP
